trans-unit.resname: APC·1 | Angelfire Crusader | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 红：天使焰圣战军得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: APC·2 | Coalition Flag | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature you control\nEnchanted creature is a Flagbearer.\nWhile an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
trans-unit.target: 联盟军旗只能结附于由你操控的生物上。受此结界的生物类别成为旗手。若对手所使用的咒语或异能可以场上的任何旗手为目标，则该牌手所选择的目标中至少要包括一个旗手。

trans-unit.resname: APC·3 | Coalition Honor Guard | Card Name
APC·3 | Coalition Honor Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
trans-unit.target: 对手于施放咒语或起动异能过程中选择目标时，如果其能选择至少一个战场上的旗手，则必须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: APC·4 | Dega Disciple | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.\n{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 黑，横置：目标生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。红，横置：目标生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: APC·5 | Dega Sanctuary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控红色或黑色的永久物，你便获得2点生命。若你同时操控红色永久物及黑色永久物，则改为你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {R} as you cast this spell.)\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate CARDNAME."\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.
trans-unit.target: 增幅1黑和／或红若你已支付其1黑的增幅费用，则狄迦进化体进场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物，并具有「支付3点生命：重生狄迦进化体。」若你已支付其红的增幅费用，则狄迦进化体进场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物，并具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.resname: APC·7 | Diversionary Tactics | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 横置由你操控的两个未横置生物：横置目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: APC·8 | Divine Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止将对由你操控的生物造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·9 | Enlistment Officer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 先攻当募兵官员进场时，展示你牌库顶上的四张牌。将所有以此法展示的士兵牌置于你的手上，并将其余的牌置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: APC·10 | False Dawn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, spells and abilities you control that would add colored mana instead add that much white mana. Until end of turn, you may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控的永久物以及你所拥有而不在场上的牌，上面各种有色法术力符号都是白。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·11 | Gerrard Capashen | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.\n{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate only if CARDNAME is attacking.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，目标对手每有一张手牌，你便获得1点生命。3白：横置目标生物。你只能在杰拉尔德·卡帕轩进行攻击时使用此异能。

trans-unit.resname: APC·12 | Haunted Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME dies, exile CARDNAME and each other player creates a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行当暗祟天使从场上置入坟墓场时，将暗祟天使移出对战，并且每位其他牌手各将一个3/3黑色，具有飞行异能的天使衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Flying\n{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 飞行1，横置：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: APC·14 | Manacles of Decay | Card Name
APC·14 | Manacles of Decay | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物不能攻击。黑：受此结界的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。红：受此结界的生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: APC·15 | Orim's Thunder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{R}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{R}。）

trans-unit.resname: APC·15 | Orim's Thunder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's mana value to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。如果此咒语已增幅，则它依该永久物的法术力值对目标生物造成伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·16 | Shield of Duty and Reason | Card Name
APC·16 | Shield of Duty and Reason | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物具有反绿保护及反蓝保护。

trans-unit.resname: APC·17 | Spectral Lynx | Card Text | Paragraph 1
APC·17 | Spectral Lynx | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: {B}：重生魂魅山猫。（此生物下一次将被消灭时，改为将它横置、移出战斗，并治愈其上所有伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: APC·18 | Standard Bearer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
trans-unit.target: 若对手所使用的咒语或异能可以场上的任何旗手为目标，则该牌手所选择的目标中至少要包括一个旗手。

trans-unit.resname: APC·19 | Ceta Disciple | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.\n{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 红，横置：目标生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。绿，横置：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: APC·20 | Ceta Sanctuary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控红色或绿色的永久物，你便抓一张牌，然后从手上弃掉一张牌。若你同时操控红色永久物及绿色永久物，则改为你抓两张牌，然后从手上弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.)\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {1}{R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with trample.
trans-unit.target: 增幅1红和／或绿若你已支付其1红的增幅费用，则塞塔进化体进场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物，并具有先攻异能。若你已支付其绿的增幅费用，则塞塔进化体进场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物，并具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: APC·22 | Coastal Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行1蓝，横置：将目标卡甫移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: APC·23 | Evasive Action | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者，对由你操控的地之中的每一种基本地类别各支付1，否则反击该咒语。

trans-unit.resname: APC·24 | Ice Cave | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)
trans-unit.target: 每当任何牌手使用咒语时，任何其他牌手可以支付该咒语的法术力费用。若有任何牌手如此作，则反击该咒语。（法术力费用包括了颜色）

trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。

trans-unit.resname: APC·26 | Jaded Response | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 若目标咒语和任何由你操控的生物之间有共通的颜色，则反击该咒语。

trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)\nReturn target creature to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, it deals 2 damage to another target creature.
trans-unit.target: 增幅1红（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付1红）将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。若你已支付其增幅费用，则遗弃再对另一个目标生物造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·28 | Living Airship | Card Text | Paragraphs
APC·29 | Reef Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 横置：选择一种基本地类别，目标地成为该类别的地直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: APC·30 | Shimmering Mirage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种基本地类别。目标地成为该类别直到回合结束。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·31 | Tidal Courier | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.\n{3}{U}: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当乘潮讯使进场时，展示你牌库顶上的四张牌。将所有以此法展示的人鱼牌置于你的手上，并将其余的牌置于你的牌库底。3蓝：乘潮讯使获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: APC·32 | Unnatural Selection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 1：选择墙之外的一种生物类别。目标生物的类别成为该类别直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: APC·33 | Vodalian Mystic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 横置：选择一种颜色。目标瞬间或法术咒语成为该色。

trans-unit.resname: APC·34 | Whirlpool Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 飞行当漩涡龙兽进场时，将你的手牌洗入你的牌库中，然后抓等量的牌。当漩涡龙兽从场上置入坟墓场时，将你的手牌洗入你的牌库中，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·35 | Whirlpool Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 当漩涡骑兵进场时，将你的手牌洗入你的牌库中，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·36 | Whirlpool Warrior | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.\n{R}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 当漩涡战士进场时，将你的手牌洗入你的牌库中，然后抓等量的牌。红，牺牲漩涡战士：每位牌手将其手牌洗入其牌库中，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·37 | Dead Ringers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 除非两个目标非黑色的生物之间具有相异的颜色，否则消灭它们。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: APC·38 | Desolation Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.
trans-unit.target: 增幅白白（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付白白）飞行当荒芜天使进场时，消灭所有由你操控的地。若你已支付其增幅费用，则改为消灭所有地。

trans-unit.resname: APC·39 | Foul Presence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得-1/-1，并具有「横置：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。」

trans-unit.resname: APC·40 | Grave Defiler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Zombie cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.\n{1}{B}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当墓场污者进场时，展示你牌库顶上的四张牌。将所有以此法展示的灵俑牌置于你的手上，并将其余的牌置于你的牌库底。1黑：重生墓场污者。

trans-unit.resname: APC·41 | Last Caress | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手失去1点生命，并且你获得1点生命。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·42 | Mind Extraction | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nTarget player reveals their hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为使用心灵抓除的额外费用。目标牌手展示其手牌，并且所牺牲的生物每有一种颜色，该牌手便从手上弃掉所有该颜色的牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·43 | Mournful Zombie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 白，横置：目标牌手获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: APC·44 | Necra Disciple | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.\n{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
trans-unit.target: 绿，横置：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。白，横置：于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·45 | Necra Sanctuary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控绿色或白色的永久物，目标牌手便失去1点生命。若你同时操控绿色永久物及白色永久物，则改为该牌手失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{G} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Whenever CARDNAME deals damage, you gain that much life."
trans-unit.target: 增幅1绿和／或白若你已支付其1绿的增幅费用，则涅夸进化体进场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物，并具有践踏异能。若你已支付其白的增幅费用，则涅夸进化体进场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物，并具有「每当涅夸进化体造成伤害时，你便获得与该伤害等量的生命。」

trans-unit.resname: APC·47 | Phyrexian Arena | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: APC·48 | Phyrexian Gargantua | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当非瑞克西亚巨罡兽进战场时，你抓两张牌且失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: APC·50 | Planar Despair | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Domain — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
trans-unit.target: 在由你操控的地之中，每有一种基本地类别，所有生物便得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: APC·51 | Quagmire Druid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 绿，横置，牺牲一个生物：消灭目标结界。

trans-unit.source: Target player exiles all cards from their hand face down. At the beginning of the end step of that player's next turn, that player returns those cards to their hand.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将他手上所有的牌以牌面朝下的方式移出对战。在该牌手的下一个回合结束时，他将这些牌移回其手上。

trans-unit.resname: APC·53 | Urborg Uprising | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: APC·53 | Urborg Uprising | Card Text | Paragraph 2
APC·54 | Zombie Boa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 1黑：选择一种颜色。于本回合中，每当灵俑蟒蛇被该色的生物阻挡时，消灭该生物。你只可以于你能够使用法术的时机下使用此异能。

trans-unit.resname: APC·55 | Bloodfire Colossus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: {R}，牺牲血焰巨像：血焰巨像对每个生物和每位牌手各造成6点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·56 | Bloodfire Dwarf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
trans-unit.target: 红，牺牲血焰矮人：血焰矮人对每个不具飞行异能的生物各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·57 | Bloodfire Infusion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature you control\n{R}, Sacrifice enchanted creature: CARDNAME deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to each creature.
trans-unit.target: 血焰灌输只能结附于由你操控的生物上。红，牺牲受此结界的生物：血焰灌输对每个生物各造成等同于受此结界的生物之力量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·58 | Bloodfire Kavu | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 2 damage to each creature.
trans-unit.target: 红，牺牲血焰卡甫：血焰卡甫对每个生物各造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·59 | Desolation Giant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{W}{W}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{W}{W}。）当荒芜巨人进战场时，消灭所有由你操控的其他生物。若它已增幅，则改为消灭所有其他生物。

trans-unit.resname: APC·60 | Dwarven Landslide | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker—{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land. (You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)\nDestroy target land. If this spell was kicked, destroy another target land.
trans-unit.target: 增幅～2红，牺牲一张地。（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付o2红并牺牲一张地）消灭目标地。若你已支付其增幅费用，则再消灭另一个目标地。

trans-unit.resname: APC·61 | Dwarven Patrol | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.\nWhenever you cast a nonred spell, untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 矮人巡逻队在你的重置步骤中不可重置。每当你使用非红色的咒语时，重置矮人巡逻队。

trans-unit.resname: APC·62 | Goblin Ringleader | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 敏捷（此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）

trans-unit.resname: APC·62 | Goblin Ringleader | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 当鬼怪魁首进战场时，展示你牌库顶的四张牌。将以此法展示的所有鬼怪牌置于你手上，其余则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you cast this spell.)\nCARDNAME deals X damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, it deals X damage to that creature's controller. If this spell was kicked with its {3}{U} kicker, you draw X cards.
trans-unit.target: 增幅2红和／或3蓝（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付2红和／或3蓝）烨焰对目标生物造成X点伤害。若你已支付其2红的增幅费用，则烨焰亦对该生物的操控者造成X点伤害。若你已支付其3蓝的增幅费用，则你抓X张牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·64 | Kavu Glider | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {W}: CARDNAME gets +0/+1 until end of turn.\n{U}: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: APC·65 | Minotaur Tactician | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nCARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature.\nCARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷（你操控该生物的该回合中，它便可以攻击以及横置）只要你操控任何白色生物，牛头怪战术家便得+1/+1。只要你操控任何蓝色生物，牛头怪战术家便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: APC·66 | Raka Disciple | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.\n{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 白，横置：于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的1点伤害。蓝，横置：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: APC·67 | Raka Sanctuary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, CARDNAME deals 3 damage instead.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控白色或蓝色的永久物，拉卡圣域便对目标生物造成1点伤害。若你同时操控白色永久物及蓝色永久物，则改为拉卡圣域对该生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{W} and/or {U} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} and/or {U} as you cast this spell.)\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {1}{W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Whenever CARDNAME deals damage, you gain that much life."\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with flying.
trans-unit.target: 增幅1白和／或蓝若你已支付其1白的增幅费用，拉卡进化体进场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物，并具有「每当拉卡进化体造成伤害时，你便获得与该伤害等量的生命。」若你已支付其蓝的增幅费用，拉卡进化体进场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物，并具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: APC·70 | Tahngarth's Glare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.

trans-unit.resname: APC·72 | Wild Research | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle.\n{1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 1白：从你的牌库中搜寻一张结界牌并展示之。将它置于你手上，然后从你的手上随机弃掉一张牌。然后将你的牌库洗牌。1蓝：从你的牌库中搜寻一张瞬间牌并展示之。将它置于你手上，然后从你的手上随机弃掉一张牌。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.target: 蓝，横置：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。黑，横置：目标生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} and/or {B} as you cast this spell.)\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {1}{U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.\nIf CARDNAME was kicked with its {B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate CARDNAME."

trans-unit.target: {G}：选择一种颜色，心灵贩子成为该色直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: APC·122 | Squee's Embrace | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2.\nWhen enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+2/+2。当受此结界的生物置入坟墓场时，将该生物牌移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.resname: APC·123 | Squee's Revenge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个数字。掷同样次数的硬币，或是直到你输去任何一掷为止。若你赢得每一掷，则你每赢得一掷，便抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: APC·124 | Suffocating Blast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell and CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语，并且窒息冲击波对目标生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: APC·125 | Temporal Spring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标永久物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: APC·127 | Yavimaya's Embrace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
APC·127 | Yavimaya's Embrace | Card Text | Paragraph 2
APC·127 | Yavimaya's Embrace | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
trans-unit.target: 热火对任意一个或两个目标造成共2点伤害，你可以任意分配。

trans-unit.source: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种颜色。目标咒语或永久物成为该色直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
trans-unit.target: 所有由你操控的地成为1/1生物直到回合结束。它们仍然是地。

trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its mana value.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。你失去等同于其法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由目标牌手操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。
放逐目标进行攻击的生物。
生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: APC·133 | Brass Herald | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 于黄铜传令使进战场时，选择一种生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: APC·133 | Brass Herald | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 当黄铜传令使进战场时，展示你牌库顶的四张牌。将所有以此法展示的该类别生物牌置于你手上，其余则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: APC·133 | Brass Herald | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard CARDNAME, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 如果由对手操控的咒语或异能使得你弃掉打肢怪，则改为将它放进战场且上面有两个+1/+1指示物，而非置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: APC·135 | Dragon Arch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：你可以将一张多色生物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: APC·136 | Emblazoned Golem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)\nSpend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.\nIf CARDNAME was kicked, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 增幅X（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付X）只能以有色法术力支付X，并且每种颜色最多只能以此法支付一点法术力。若你已支付其增幅费用，则纹章魔像进场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: APC·137 | Legacy Weapon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
APC·137 | Legacy Weapon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal CARDNAME and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果远古神兵将从任何区域进入坟墓场，则改为展示远古神兵，并将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: APC·138 | Mask of Intolerance | Card Name
APC·138 | Mask of Intolerance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，若在该牌手所操控的地之中，有四种或更多种基本地类别，偏执的面具便对该牌手造成3点伤害。

APC·139 | Battlefield Forge | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R} or {W}. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}或{W}。战场融炉对你造成1点伤害。

APC·140 | Caves of Koilos | Card Text | Paragraph 1
APC·140 | Caves of Koilos | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} or {U}. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to you.

trans-unit.resname: PAPC·100 | Fungal Shambler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 践踏每当真菌跛行兽对任何对手造成伤害时，你抓一张牌并且该对手从其手上弃掉一张牌。
